description: Watercolor tattoos have a delicate and beautiful appearance, as though someone has taken a paintbrush to the exposed skin. Watercolor tattoo artists create these unique pieces by combining multiple colors of ink on the surface of the skin in order to create an illusion that looks like paint. Watercolor tattoos contain shades of muted and vibrant colors along with soft watercolor effects that look as though they were painted on your skin.
name: Watercolor Tattoos
